articles.author: Eli Stokols
articles.title: Trump's frustration with Ukraine and Europe boils over - Politico
articles.description: The president is clearly eager to move beyond the war, but a peace deal remains elusive.
articles.content: We took out openly anti-Ukrainian points, Zelenskyy told a group of reporters in Kyiv, emphasizing that Ukraine still needs stronger security guarantees and that he isnt ready to give Russia more lan… [+6813 chars]
